<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script removes unique attribute from tour_id column of sys_embedded_tour_guide table </description>
        <name>Remove unique from tour_id</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// set unique false
var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
gr.addQuery("element", "tour_id");
gr.addQuery("name", "sys_embedded_tour_guide");
gr.query();
gr.next();
gr.setValue("unique", false);
gr.setWorkflow(false);
gr.update();

// remove from DB 
var tableName = 'sys_embedded_tour_guide';
var isUniqueIndex = true;
var columnsInIndex = ['tour_id'];
var util = new GlideIndexUtils();
util.dropByExactElementSequence(tableName, isUniqueIndex, columnsInIndex);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-05-06 13:08:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>320d43ea532010109c22ddeeff7b128d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove unique from tour_id</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Guided Tours" source="com.glide.guided_tours">c1b970283cf1311068bcf327dfe37f35</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_320d43ea532010109c22ddeeff7b128d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-05-26 08:01:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
